oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-03-17 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 17, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer Martha Carson, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Chubby Wise, Tommy Jackson, Moon Mullican, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Moon Mullican; Minnie Pearl; Martha Carson; Chet Atkins; Hank Snow
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Snow introduces Moon Mullican -- You Don't Have To Be A Baby To Cry (Moon Mullican) -- Hank Snow introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Hank Snow introduces Martha Carson -- Journey To The Sky (Martha Carson) -- Hank Snow introduces Chet Atkins -- Black Mountain Rag (Chet Atkins) -- Hank Snow talks -- I Don't Hurt Anymore (Hank Snow) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hank Snow) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Hay, George D. (George Dewey), 1895-1968; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Mullican, Moon, 1909-1967; Jackson, Tommy; Wise, Chubby; Snow, Hank; Carson, Martha
